title: Reinforcement Learning as a Production Tool on AAA Games
description:
- Demonstration that RL can learn to play AAA video games – at least when it comes to “reactive” gameplay that does not require long term planning nor high-level understanding of the world
 - How to interface RL algorithms with a modern game engine
 - Which algorithms you should use (or not), and why
 - How such RL agents can help productions during a game's development
 - What can go wrong and how to avoid it
